named-query.name: BC_READ_CUSTOMER_ROLES_BY_CUSTOMER_ID
named-query.query: SELECT customerRole FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.CustomerRole customerRole WHERE customerRole.customer.id = :customerId

named-query.name: BC_READ_ROLE_BY_NAME
named-query.query: SELECT role FROM org.broadleafcommerce.profile.domain.Role role WHERE role.roleName = :name
